MS MCQs

    Post job usage in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. You purchased items for a job and they are received in the warehouse. However, the project manager can’t find them in the list of job ledger entries for that job. Why?

      Business Central only creates job ledger entries when you invoice a purchase order.

      You can only post items to a job from a purchase invoice, not from a purchase order.

      You must first run the Get Receipt Lines function for the job.

      You can only post items to a job from a job journal, not from a purchase document.


    2. From where can you enter item tracking information for an item and then post it to a job?

      From a purchase line, a job journal line, and a job journal G/L line

      From a purchase line and a job journal line

      Only from a purchase line

      Only from a job journal line and a job G/L journal line
